channel.title: Portfolios on The Streamliners
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on The Streamliners

item.title: Karobar Easy
item.description: Mark Attendance Owner can mark attendance, view check-in check-out times of all staffs at one place. Monthly Attendance Owner can view individual monthly attendance of all staffs. Location Tracking Owner can track location of each staff at once. He can also view location history of the time interval he wants. Location tracking filter While location tracking, owner can filter staffs based on their designation.

item.title: Byaaz Book
item.description: Major features of the app are : Interest Calculator You can calculate the interest in two different ways i.e. Simple Interest and Compound interest, based on your preference. Backup & Restore You can backup your whole data of customers and their transactions, with just one click. Byaaj Book gives you the flexibility to restore the whole content of the app. Fully Dynamic You can edit the customers, bills, and transactions, by long tapping on them.

item.title: TC
item.description:
TC is a full fledged e-Shopping app. We challenged ourselves to build an ecom system. The biggest challenge in the ecom system is to keep multiple apps (Admin & User) in sync.
Features Following are the major features of the Tirupati Collection app :

item.title: VFresh
item.description: Admin app Features of Admin app : User app Features of User app : Agent app Client wanted a system to promote his business. For this, he introduced agents. Agents will simply share their unique promocodes with users. Users while purchasing, will get discount by applying agent’s promocodes. But the challenge here was : The promocode needs to be expired after 3 days i.e. every Agent will get a new promocode at intervals of 3 days.

item.title: LocatIN
item.description: What we do? We solve the problem of building fast, lightweight and easy to use indoor map solution for large infrastructures. We are eagerly looking for customers. If you want your venue to be digitalized, contact us now! We will build a Unique NextGen Indoor map solution for your campus. We are an incubated start-up @ JECRC Incubation center, JECRC University. Videos Introductory video LocatIN for university Big Picture Our service To simplify indoor wayfindings at large campuses like hospitals, universities, shopping malls etc.
